entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW LIKELY IN THE MORNING
SNOW ACCUMULATION UP TO 1 INCH POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
